subject: Sales
title: Know Your Audience Before You Speak
description: A 60-second lesson on Know Your Audience Before You Speak.

hook.text: A startup pitched advanced AI features to a board that only cared about revenue. The room went cold.

buildup.text: Tailoring a pitch to the audience is the difference between deep resonance and total irrelevance.

discovery.text: Before pitching, answer three things: what do they value, what do they fear, and who makes the decision?

twist.text: The same product needs different pitches for a CFO, a CTO, and an end user. One size fits nobody.

climax.text: Research your audience obsessively. The pitch that mirrors their priorities wins their attention.

punchline.text: Pitch to their priorities, not yours.

quiz.question: Why did the AI startup's pitch fail?
options: They pitched features when the audience cared about revenue
